hero.title: Casa dei Narcisi
hero.subtitle: Modern loft in the heart of Chinatown, Milan
host.title: Your hosts
host.text:
We are a middle-aged Milanese couple, deeply connected to this city and to its discreet way of welcoming guests.

For several years we have personally taken care of Casa dei Narcisi, a small loft in the Chinatown district, renovated with great attention to everyday comfort.

We believe in simple and genuine hospitality: being there when needed, stepping back when not, and making every guest feel at home.
